overview: The AI system has undergone a significant transformation from a basic counter app to a comprehensive luxury chauffeur service app called Gyde. This transformation includes the implementation of a new authentication flow, profile setup, booking flows, and a new homepage layout, all following a dark theme UI. The system now includes numerous new features and has adopted a more robust MVVM architecture using Stacked.

current_state: The system is now a comprehensive luxury chauffeur service app called Gyde, with a dark theme UI. It includes comprehensive flows for authentication, profile setup, and booking. The application now starts with a splash screen and transitions through the new flows before reaching the home view. The system has adopted a more robust MVVM architecture using Stacked, with ViewModels for each view, proper routing, and dependency injection. The system has also implemented secure storage for sensitive data and API integration points.
